name: Discount for Envato Customers with EDD Products
author: SmartDataSoft

sections.description:
Discount for Envato Customers for EDD Products plugin creates discount/coupon code for Easy Digital Download products for the old customers of Envato Marketplace.

Are you selling products on your own site with Easy Digital Downloads plugin? And you also have older customers from Envato Marketplace whom you want to convert to your site? Giving special discount is a great way to do that, don’t you think?

This plugin will allow you to create discount plan for your older customers from Envato with their purchase code so that they can enjoy a special discount for the products in your EDD site.

Awesome!!! Isn’t it?

Features

-> Global Discount Plan for Edd Products for Envato Products
-> Multiple Discount Plan for Multiple EDD Products and Envato Products
-> Rich Documentation
-> Specific Plan for Specific Envato and EDD Products [PRO Extension]
-> Email Notification for Newly Generated Discount Code [PRO Extension]

Get Pro Extension

How does Discount for Envato Customers for EDD work?

Users will need to put their purchase code in the form and then click the button. The plugin will check if there is a plan exists against that purchase code. If yes it will generate a discount code for the add products included in the corresponding plan.

How to Use?

e.g.

  1. After installing the plugin go to EDD Settings -> Extensions
  2. Put your Envato Personal Token. Also set the discount percentage
  3. Go to the edit page of the EDD product you want to give discount for
  4. Under the page you will see a custom field “Plan for Envato Customers”.
  5. Put the Plan Name and Envato Product Ids as comma seperated string and save.
  6. Put the Shortcode “[edddfe_purchase_code_shortcode]” in any page to get the EDD discount generator form.
  7. Users will only need to put their purchase code from envato in the form and click the button. The plugin will do the rest.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload edd-discount-for-envato-customers folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Start using it by going to the Easy Digital Downloads -> Settings -> Extension menu from settings.
sections.faq:
Can I generate discount code against multiple Envato Products?

Yes you can. Just put the ids in a comma seperated string in the field.
